DOC.brief_summary: This single arm study continue drug safety surveillance , assessment adherence , patient postmenopausal osteoporosis receive monthly oral Bonviva ML19930 , BonAdAsia study . All patient complete 6 month ML19930 continue receive Bonviva ( 150mg po , monthly ) additional 6 month . The anticipated time study treatment 3-12 month , target sample size 500+ individual .
DOC.brief_title: ExBonAdAsia Study : A Study Once Monthly Bonviva ( Ibandronate ) Women With Post-Menopausal Osteoporosis .
DOC.criteria: patient respond oral monthly Bonviva BonAdAsia study ; willing continue Bonviva treatment 6 month . none specify .
